#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
 
#include <map>
 
 
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
    map <long long,long long> m;
    long long n,i,j,cnt;
    cin >> n;
    for(i=0; i<n; i++){
        cin >> m[i];
    }
    for(i=0; i<n; i++){
        for(j=0; j<n; j++){
            if(m[i] == m[j] && i<j)
                return 0;
        }
    }
 
    cnt = 0;
    for(i=0; i<n; i++){
            for(j=0; j<n-i-1; j++){
                if(m[j] > m[j+1]){
                    int t = m[j];
                    m[j] = m[j+1];
                    m[j+1] = t;
                    cnt++;
                }
            }
            }
 
 
 
        cout << "Number of inversions are " << cnt << "\n";
 
 
    return 0;
}
